description.narrative: III. Project’s Purpose or Objective:The project builds on UN-Habitat’s principles and approaches in terms of inclusive planning and sustainable local governance and the results and tools generated by the Municipal Spatial Planning Support Programme in Kosovo (MuSPP – implemented since 2005 and financed by Sida) which supported efficient management of local governments through capacity-building programmes and on-the-job assistance, notably in terms of participatory spatial planning processes as well as project design and implementation. The project will hence combine tailored on-the-job assistance towards ‘learning by doing’, dedicated trainings, peer-learning and exchange of experiences.The inception phase aims to conduct baseline assessment and establish institutional, operational, and political framework for successful implementation of a three-year programme which would strive to foster inclusive development and good governance in northern Kosovo through support to integration of municipalities in Kosovo’s planning framework, with strong local democratic oversight, and consistent with effective multi-level governance.More particularly, the objectives of the inception phase are as follows: a) Assess municipal and civil society capacities with a view to calibrate the scope of work/ support to be provided in the core implementation phase of the programme and devise/ refine related baseline, targets and indicators; b) Kick-start building capacities of municipal administrations and relevant stakeholders in North Kosovo with a view to pave the way for the development of strategic planning processes and products; c) Invest in strategic support to civil society mobilization and public dialogue contributing to increased local government transparency, responsiveness and accountability (through partnering with (inter)national NGOs); d) Initiate processes leading to constructive inter-municipal and local-central dialogue and cooperation.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya
